name: WIZARD MEALEE
description:
There’s no such thing as “sharing is caring” in the wizarding world. Cast powerful spells to push your friends off the tower, leaving you with all the delicious food. 

Wizard Mealee is an online multiplayer action game where you battle your friends to become the last wizard standing on a mighty tower above the clouds. Getting your munch on will make you more powerful, but also make you a bigger target. Is a wizard giving you trouble? Try eating some cake, and launch him to space!

This game was made in 3 days for the Food Jam:
Ørjan Lopez - Project Lead, Programmer, Game Design, Technical Art, Sound
Megan McCurdy - Art lead, 3D and Texture Artist
Maeve Bea - Concept Art
Courtney Millman - 3D and Texture Artist
Kai Woitczyk - 3D and Texture Artist

**Needs steam to be open to play online! Make sure that you and your steam friends use the same download region to play together**

Join the Illumine Games discord to have a nice chat and find people to play with!
 https://discord.gg/kfmN75T
